content: odie by mel kennelly is the perfect layer for your pup crochet this colorful sweater with just 1 ball of lanas light and 1 lanas light mini color pack classic granny squares and the join as you go technique make for a fun seamless project that will help keep your best friend toasty warm sizes s m l finished measurements width 15 20 20 / 38 50 50 cm length neck to tail 15 20 30 / 38 50 76 cm yarn berroco lanas light 100 g #78122 tide mc berroco lanas light mini color pack 25 g each #3 cool beach - 78130 driftwood c1 78110 grapefruit c2 78125 lavender c3 78118 aquamarine c4 78102 steel cut oats c5 hooks size g-6 / 4 mm notions tapestry needle three ½ / 12 mm buttons gauge granny square rnds 1 5 measures 4 / 10 cm across does not include joining round gauge is measured after blocking to save time and ensure accurate measurements take time to check gauge
